name: the decay kitchen experience (beta?)
description:
sorry i have no idea how to open the mac one so i just uploaded it as the zip file. the other two should work just fine tho lol.

p.s. the audio is terrible for some reason so you might wanna turn down the volume. i dont know why this happened, but it happened right after i added two trucks into the audio files so i think that cursed the other audios.

[SLIGHT HORROR WARNING?]

enjoy!
